CustomField.description: Salesforce domain used to match the current org's domain. Used in Apex to automatically select the correct environment configuration based on the current Salesforce domain.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the Salesforce domain (e.g., "mycompany.my.salesforce.com" or "mycompany--sandbox.sandbox.my.salesforce.com"). This will be used to automatically match the current org's domain with the appropriate environment configuration.
CustomField.label: Salesforce Domain
